title: Crepes Stand - Food Booth
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Western, French, Take-out only, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Food stand at the daily market in Erlangen. Offers vegan choices in sweet as well savory toppings, including vegan cheese, roast onion, agave syrup, marple syrup, nuts, powdered sugar. Closes early during bad weather.
